body_content.explanation: the fact of needing to be dealt with carefully because people may be offended or upset:
examples: Everyone is aware of the touchiness of the situation .
The advisers wouldn't be identified because of the touchiness of the subject.

body_content.explanation: the quality of being easily offended or upset:
examples: My opponent's touchiness every time he is questioned should make us more concerned.
These people blame others, but fail to recognize their own insecurities and touchiness.
